Detailed Description

Read access for the SimVectorConstant and SimVector classes.

Author:
Lee Netherton
The SimvectorReadAccess class provides a means of ensuring that the SimVector's data pointer is up-to-date. Validity is maintained automatically using the getDataPointer() function. To in validate the data pointer the invalidate() function can be used. The pointer will then be automatically updated upon the next getDataPointer() call. Manual updating of the pointer can be forced using the updateDataPointer() function.
